title: Roommate woes
content: My mf roommate roams in a chaddi every. He doesn't even change it daily and he stinks alsoo. Daily I've to see his same blue chaddi. He throws wet clothes in the room and it stinks like fucking hell. He looks worst than that raju in chota bheem. It's soo embarrassing when my friends come to my roomðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­. My other roommates are also irritated with him but he don't listen
